casebody.data:
BEN GYADU v. D’ADDARIO INDUSTRIES, INC., ET AL.

MCDONALD, C. J., and SULLIVAN and VERTEFEU-ILLE, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Ben Gyadu, pro se, in support of the petition. Decided October 25, 2000

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
